excerpt: Understated eatery whipping up creative Greek & Italian entrees & desserts, plus a large wine list.
detail_description: Salis is a charming eatery located on the waterfront of Chania's romantic old Venetian port. The restaurant offers a mix of Greek and Italian cuisine, complemented by an extensive wine list. Guests can enjoy their meals on the chatter-filled patio overlooking the harbor or inside the cavernous space adorned with abstract murals and walls of wine bottles.
name: Salis

excerpt: Classic regional dishes are served in this snug, rustic-chic eatery that has stone walls & a bar.
detail_description: Peskesi is a snug, rustic-chic eatery in Iraklio that offers classic regional dishes and serves the finest traditional Cretan gastronomy. The restaurant is emblematic of its owner's vision, Panagiotis Manganas, who established a small organic farm in the area of Haraso Hersonissos.
name: Peskesi

excerpt: Simple restaurant providing traditional local dishes & wines in a storied building.
detail_description: TAMAM RESTAURANT CHANIA is a charming eatery located in the old town, housed in an old Turkish hamam. It offers a wide selection of traditional local dishes and an extensive list of wines. The restaurant's mix of Greek and Middle Eastern style food has garnered it a reputation for serving some of the best cuisine in Chania.
name: TAMAM RESTAURANT CHANIA
address: 49 Zampeliou str Old Harbour, Chania 731 00, Greece

detail_description: Avli Taverna is a charming restaurant-tavern located in Agios Nikolaos, Crete. The garden-style setting creates a quaint and inviting atmosphere for diners. The menu offers delicious Cretan dishes such as tzatziki, souvlaki, moussaka, and more. Guests have praised the friendly and accommodating staff who go above and beyond to provide excellent service.
name: Avli

detail_description: Chrisostomos is an award-winning restaurant located in the Venetian city of Chania, known for its authentic cuisine made with locally sourced produce. Despite not having a sea view, it remains popular and booking in advance is recommended. The restaurant specializes in soulful Sfakia-style mountain cooking, offering dishes like rosemary-fried snails, roasted sardines, bitter greens, and traditional boureki.
name: Chrisostomos

detail_description: Thalassino Ageri is a charming traditional fish tavern situated near the serene port of Chania, offering a warm and inviting atmosphere. Established in 1985, this eatery has been serving high-quality seafood dishes to its patrons. The restaurant's outdoor seating provides a picturesque view of the tranquil sea, creating an idyllic dining experience. Guests can savor their meals accompanied by a selection of fine wines, ouzo, or raki.
name: Thalassino Ageri

detail_description: Prima Plora Organic Restaurant & Wine Bar is a modern eatery located on the outskirts of Rethymnon, offering an idyllic setting by the sea. The restaurant prides itself on serving excellent seafood along with meat and vegetable dishes, all impeccably presented. Their menu features traditional Greek dishes with a creative twist, showcasing fresh seafood, Cretan starters, and succulent meat dishes.
name: PRIMA PLORA Οrganic Restaurant & Wine Bar - Rethymno

detail_description: Pelagos Sea Side Restaurant, located near the settlement of Ierapetra in southern Greece, is a remarkable dining establishment. It boasts its own exclusive beach area just a short distance from the main dining space. The restaurant offers delectable cuisine and excellent service at an elevated level. Guests can indulge in refreshing beverages like the Manda Cloud while enjoying their time on the beach, as the attentive staff is always ready to cater to their needs.
name: Pelagos Sea Side Restaurant

detail_description: Captain Fidias Restaurant, located on Sfinari beach amidst towering trees, is a renowned dining spot that relies on the daily catch of Captain Fidias' four sons and their two caiques for its fresh seafood. Since 1976, this establishment has been celebrated for its sun-dried octopus, fish soup, lobsters, squid, and more. Mrs. Ariadne assists in choosing dishes and ensures a delightful dining experience.
name: Captain Fidias

detail_description: Raki Ba Raki is a popular spirit in Crete, similar to Italian Grappa, often offered at the end of meals in local restaurants. While it can be purchased, it may not taste as good back home. Vegetarian options are abundant on the island, with many restaurants offering meat-free dishes during Greek Orthodox feast or fasting days. Raki Ba Raki on Arabatzoglou 17 offers traditional favorites with a contemporary twist using fresh local produce for a laid-back dining experience.
name: Raki Ba Raki

detail_description: Nestled in a charming square away from the bustling crowds, The Well of the Turk stands out as a culinary gem in Chania's old town. This delightful eatery offers an enticing blend of Greek, Middle Eastern, and Moroccan flavors that will surely captivate your taste buds. With its beautiful interiors and serene yard, it provides a tranquil escape even during the peak summer months.
name: The Well of the Turk

detail_description: Karnagio / Pita tou Riga is a popular Greek tavern located near the picturesque lake of Voulismeni in the heart of Agios Nikolaos. This restaurant is known for its delicious pita gyros, a Greek street food favorite. Karnagio strictly collaborates with Cretan producers, using local herbs and products from villages around the Mirabello area.
name: Karnagio / Pita tou Riga

detail_description: To Pigadi Restaurant is a stunning dining spot housed in a 16th-century Venetian building that was once stables. It offers traditional Cretan and Mediterranean dishes in a beautiful setting. The menu features rabbit stifado, mezze starters, local cheeses, and house wines, with complimentary cakes for dessert. Located in Rethymno, Greece, this restaurant focuses on authentic Cretan and Greek cuisine with friendly staff and an excellent wine selection.
name: To Pigadi Restaurant

excerpt: Laid-back restaurant with a patio serving seafood specialties amid simply decorated surrounds.
detail_description: Nestled in the charming Old Town of Splanzia, To Maridaki is a delightful seafood haven that perfectly balances quality and affordability. This cozy eatery may be small, but it boasts an impressive reputation for its fresh daily catch, with dishes crafted from whatever fish and seafood are available at the market. Diners can expect generous portions of expertly grilled fish and squid, alongside a variety of salads and mezedhes that cater to all tastes.
name: To Maridaki

detail_description: Nestled in a historic 1890 building overlooking the picturesque lake, Migomis Piano Restaurant & Café is a beloved dining spot in Agios Nikolaos. This charming restaurant offers an elegant ambiance, attentive service, and a diverse menu featuring international and Mediterranean dishes alongside local specialties. With its extensive wine list from around the world, Migomis promises a memorable culinary experience.
name: Migomis Piano Restaurant & Café
address: Nikolaou Plastira 20, Nik. Plastira 22, Ag. Nikolaos 721 00, Greece

detail_description: Pelagos Fish Tavern is a renowned dining spot in Agios Nikolaos, known for its enchanting courtyard garden and elegant neoclassical mansion setting. It's considered one of the best fish taverns in the area, offering simply grilled fresh catches from the nearby harbor, accompanied by local vegetables and Cretan wines. The restaurant also serves winning salads with unique combinations and well-presented pasta dishes.
name: Pelagos

detail_description: Nestled on the rooftop of the Lato Boutique Hotel, Herbs' Garden is a delightful culinary oasis that offers breathtaking panoramic views of Heraklion's Venetian harbor and ancient fortress walls. This glass-enclosed terrace is an ideal spot for special occasions, from romantic dinners to celebratory gatherings. The menu features a delectable array of Mediterranean dishes, including fresh seafood and tender meats, perfectly complemented by local wines or refreshing cocktails like their signature Herb's Garden drink.
name: Herbs' Garden

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque village of Loutro, Ilios is a charming seaside tavern that captures the essence of Cretan culture and cuisine. With stunning views of the Libyan Sea as your backdrop, this delightful eatery offers an authentic taste of Crete. The Androulakakis family, who run Ilios, also provide fresh fish for their delectable seafood dishes, ensuring every bite reflects the Mediterranean's bounty.
name: Ilios

detail_description: Neoria Fish Tavern- Xilouris is a popular waterfront taverna that attracts both locals and visitors. The restaurant is known for its fresh grilled fish and other seafood dishes, as well as traditional Greek appetizers like taramasalata. The historic location, situated near the Venetian shipyard buildings, adds to the charm of dining here.
name: Neoria Fish Tavern- Xilouris

detail_description: La Bodega is a charming waterfront restaurant located in Chania Old Town, offering a great selection of Greek wines and delicious food. Situated on the edge of the old harbor, it provides unbeatable views of the Venetian Harbor. The menu features fresh seafood, elevated traditional Greek dishes, and delightful mezedes to complement your wine experience. While slightly more expensive, the Italian-influenced cuisine and attentive staff create a pleasant atmosphere for enjoying your meal.
name: La Bodega

detail_description: Pulse Vegan-Chania is a highly recommended restaurant in Chania, Crete, offering a complete and authentic gastronomic experience. The menu features a sumptuous selection of vegetarian and vegan dishes made from fresh local ingredients. Visitors rave about the delicious meze sharing platters, vegan moussaka, and burgers. The restaurant also offers an interesting menu with options like moussaka, casserole, risotto, starters, desserts, and fresh smoothies.
name: Pulse Vegan-chania

detail_description: Located in Rethymno, Hasika is a top restaurant offering modern twists on traditional Greek cuisine. The menu features fresh and local ingredients with a short but interesting selection of appetizers. Visitors praise the delicious and creatively seasoned food, with standout dishes like deconstructed moussaka and well-made flank steak. The chic ambiance, superb service, and use of local seasonal produce make dining at Hasika an unforgettable experience.
name: Hasika

detail_description: Lemonokipos Restaurant, named after the lemon garden it's nestled in, has been a staple in Rethymnon since 2000. It offers a blend of traditional and modern Greek and Cretan cuisine, sourcing fresh local ingredients daily. Housed in an old Venetian mansion with a century-old history, the restaurant boasts a charming courtyard adorned with lemon trees. The garden setting provides a delightful ambiance for enjoying coffee or indulging in their renowned lemon tart.
name: Lemonokipos Restaurant

excerpt: Relaxed, bohemian restaurant offering a terrace & Mediterranean fare, plus coffee, cocktails & wine.
detail_description: Ginger Concept is a relaxed and bohemian restaurant located in the old town, offering a charming terrace and serving Mediterranean fare. The restaurant provides a unique dining experience with its Brazilian snacks, carpaccios, salads, and pizzas. Additionally, it features a lovely shop and is recommended by locals for its inviting ambiance and delicious cuisine.
name: Ginger Concept

detail_description: Ntounias is a renowned traditional tavern located in Crete, listed among the top 20 best taverns in Greece. The restaurant prides itself on cooking everything in wood stoves using locally sourced ingredients. Stelios, the owner and cook, prepares mouthwatering dishes such as goat with herbs, cabbage rolls, slow-cooked meat, and freshly fried potatoes.
name: Ntounias

detail_description: Nestled in the charming old town of Rethymno, Castelo Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with its modern twist on traditional Cretan cuisine. The restaurant's beautifully decorated space exudes a timeless charm, surrounded by historic buildings and adorned with greenery and stone. The attentive and professional staff ensure a pleasant dining experience, accommodating special dietary needs with customized dishes.
name: Castelo Restaurant

detail_description: Apiri Greek Eatery is a hidden gem nestled in the backstreets of Heraklion, offering a culinary experience that delights food enthusiasts. The restaurant prides itself on using only the freshest seasonal produce and locally sourced meat and fish to create traditional Greek dishes with modern twists and captivating flavors. With an imaginative menu inspired by Cretan, Mediterranean, and eastern culinary traditions, every dish at Apiri is a unique and delectable masterpiece.
name: Apiri greek_eatery

detail_description: Apostolis Restaurant is a popular seafood spot in Hania, with delicious grilled fish and Cretan dishes. The owner reigns there, but the quieter eastern harbour makes Apostolis II the more popular restaurant. The staff are friendly and welcoming, and their grilled cuttlefish is amazing. The octopus can be a little overcooked, but it's great with garlic bread soaked in butter if you like it this way.
name: Apostolis Restaurant

detail_description: The seafood restaurant 7 Thalasses is located on the seafront, and offers a great view of the ocean. The staff is friendly and attentive, and their seafood dishes are full of Mediterranean flair. They serve meals within a reasonable amount of time, and it's definitely worth checking out!
name: 7 Thalasses Rethymno Restaurant

detail_description: Erganos is a traditional restaurant located near Kazantzaki park in Heraklion, offering authentic local cuisine to a mainly local clientele. The cozy dining room provides a warm atmosphere, especially during colder seasons when the fireplace is lit. The menu features mouthwatering sfakianopita pies, lamb and goat dishes, and delicious keftedes meatballs. The restaurant prides itself on its symphony of flavors through traditional Cretan dishes such as gamopilafo and apaki.
name: Erganos

detail_description: Parasties is a renowned restaurant that has been a favorite since 1999, offering an authentic dining experience with a view of the Cretan Sea. The establishment is known for its attentive service and historical ambiance, housed in a building from 1900. The interior features a modern yet rustic design with wooden tables and metal wine racks. Specializing in traditional Cretan cuisine, Parasties offers dishes cooked on bricks and serves hearty steaks, grilled seafood, and hot mezze.
name: Parasties
address: Χανδακος, Leof. Sofokli Venizelou 81, Iraklio 712 02, Greece

detail_description: Hiona Taverna is a remarkable restaurant located in an exceptional setting, offering a modern twist on traditional Cretan dishes. The menu features elaborate and beautifully presented dishes, such as saffron orzo with crayfish and grilled swordfish with lemon sauce. Guests rave about the tender and well-seasoned octopus, as well as the fresh sea bream cooked to perfection. The restaurant's dreamy location on the rocks overlooking the sea adds to its charm, providing an amazing atmosphere for dining.
name: Hiona Taverna

detail_description: Nestled in the charming village of Stalida, Restaurant Creta is a must-visit family-owned gem that has been delighting patrons since 1994. This cozy eatery offers a delectable array of traditional Greek, Cretan, and international home-cooked dishes, including options for vegetarians, vegans, and those with gluten sensitivities. The menu also features an enticing selection of signature cocktails to complement your meal.
name: Restaurant Creta

detail_description: Bankery is a popular and trendy cafe-restaurant located in the bustling Rethymnon Center, attracting both locals and tourists. The restaurant features a fantastic bar where skilled bartenders serve high-quality coffee and craft excellent cocktails. It offers a diverse menu including crispy pastries, hearty breakfasts, and fast-food options freshly cooked daily. The energetic atmosphere makes it a fun place to grab coffee or chat with friends, although it can get quite loud due to its lively energy.
name: Bankery

detail_description: Quizz, an exceptional establishment amidst the multitude of tourist-targeted average eateries, can be found tucked away in a narrow side street. This little family-owned restaurant offers an ambiance that is ideally suited for those seeking tranquility and serenity, far from the usual noise and commotion. What sets Quizz apart is their commitment to serving authentic Cretan cuisine, prepared and presented by the passionate owners themselves.
name: Quizz
address: Palaia Ethniki Odos Chanion-Kissamou platanias, Platanias 730 14, Greece

name: Cavo D'oro Restaurant
address: 42, Nearchou str Old Venetian Harbour, Rethimno 741 31, Greece

detail_description: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Rethymnon, Crete, La Boheme Restaurant is a delightful fine-dining destination that beautifully marries chic bohemian decor with a modern Mediterranean culinary experience. The restaurant's ambiance features exposed brick walls and elegant chandeliers, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. With a menu that evolves seasonally, guests can indulge in fresh dishes like grilled fish, succulent lamb shank, and flavorful seafood pasta.
name: La Boheme

detail_description: Pagopoieion, located in the heart of Heraklion Town, is a unique cafe and restaurant housed in a former 1950s ice cream factory. The retro-modern space offers international dishes with a local Cretan twist, such as chicken skewers with paprika and yogurt, and pork steak with honey and chili glaze. In addition to its culinary offerings, Pagopoieion hosts art exhibitions, music concerts, and literary events.
name: Pagopoieion

detail_description: Fraoules is a popular spot in the heart of Rethymnon, offering a lively atmosphere and delicious cocktails, making it a favorite among young people and students. The bar provides stunning views over the Rethymnon Marina, creating an unforgettable experience. It serves as a cafe-restaurant and shisha lounge until late evening, transforming into a nightclub after midnight. With friendly staff and good prices, it's advisable to arrive early or make reservations due to its popularity.
name: Fraoules

detail_description: Leventis Taverna is a hidden gem located in Stalos, just a few kilometers from Chania's touristy harbor. Run by brothers Giorgos and Panagiotis Chatzimanolakis, this family-owned restaurant has received numerous awards for its authentic Cretan cuisine. The taverna offers a unique dining experience with breathtaking mountain views and top-notch service. Guests rave about the delicious food made with fresh ingredients and the chef's personalized recommendations.
name: Leventis Taverna

detail_description: Located near the Municipal Market of Chania, Iordanis Bougatsa is a family-owned bakery that has been serving delightful bougatsa for over a century. Established in 1924, it is the oldest bougatsa store in Chania. The traditional bougatsa here comes in two varieties - sweet with custard and savory with myzithra, a local goat and sheep cheese.
name: Bougatsa Iordanis

detail_description: Arismari, Cretan Creative Cuisine - Αρισμαρί, Από Την Κρητική Γη is a restaurant located in the picturesque village of Kalyves that offers a blend of traditional Cretan flavors with a modern twist. Housed in a charming stone building, the restaurant provides an elegant yet cozy atmosphere for diners to explore the island's cuisine.
name: Arismari, Cretan Creative Cuisine

detail_description: The cocktail bar Το μοναστήρι του καρόλου is a great place to enjoy a drink in an attractive courtyard setting. The cocktails are excellent and the staff are very friendly. It's perfect for a summer evening.
name: The Monastery of Karolos

detail_description: Kritamon Wine Restaurant is a great place to enjoy a good wine and delicious food. The staff are knowledgable about wine and can help you choose the best bottle while the ambiance is perfect for relaxed dining. The restaurant has wheelchair accessible seating and accepts Visa and Mastercard, making it easy to dine out no matter what your financial situation may be.
name: Kritamon Wine Restaurant

detail_description: Pork to Beef Wild is a popular fast-food spot located in Chania, close to the old Venetian Arsenals and Splantzia square. The menu features pork and beef sandwiches, chicken wraps, hot dogs, and grilled sausages. Their handmade pita wraps are a must-try, allowing you to customize with various fresh ingredients. While it can get crowded at times due to its popularity among locals and tourists, the delicious sandwiches make the wait worthwhile.
name: Pork to Beef Wild
